entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , New Glasgow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:58 PM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.0°C

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 20 January 2023
